contained.name: calendar_alignment
contained.title: calendar_alignment
contained.description: Indicates what prototypical point in the calendar the specification is aligned to, e.g.  5th of the month . Empty if not aligned. Extracted from the  value' attribute.

contained.name: event_alignment
contained.title: event_alignment
contained.description: Indicates what real-world event the specification is aligned to if any. Extracted from the  value' attribute.

contained.name: institution_specified
contained.title: institution_specified
contained.description: Indicates if the specification is aligned with institution schedules, e.g. a hospital nursing changeover or meal serving times. Extracted from the  value' attribute.

name: DV_TIME_SPECIFICATION
title: DV_TIME_SPECIFICATION
description: This is an abstract class of which all timing specifications are specialisations. Specifies points in time, possibly linked to the calendar, or a real world repeating event, such as  breakfast.

element.short: This is an abstract class of which all timing specifications are specialisations.
element.definition: This is an abstract class of which all timing specifications are specialisations. Specifies points in time, possibly linked to the calendar, or a real world repeating event, such as  breakfast.

element.short: The specification, in the HL7v3 syntax for `PIVL` or `EIVL` types.
element.definition: The specification, in the HL7v3 syntax for `PIVL` or `EIVL` types.
